title: Exclusive Miss Fortune Icon doesn't give profile banner
body: I was so sad it didn't give me the profile banner like the other GGMF icons. Will this be fixed next patch? I was really excited for it ;-;

replies.body:
We're looking to get a fix out ASAP! 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3nbZsieF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-22T21:37:07.822+0000)
>
> We're looking to get a fix out ASAP! 
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

I am a member of PBE, I told you that a week ago in discord channel, and you said "I told peeps about the profile background", it is fixed on PBE like a while ago, how did it get into live?

I did tell them! Unfortunately, a fix for something else happened to break the hookup for this one again. With many of the feedback changes, and the animated screen coming in hot, we had a few bugs pop up very late in the process, most of which will be either hotfixed out or fixed in 8.7, depending on the severity of the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3nbZsieF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-22T21:37:07.822+0000)
>
> We're looking to get a fix out ASAP! 
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Yaaaay thank you so much :D
